round_07_scaffold.description: Motif scaffolding: TB-citrate with H-bond donors fixed, explore additional TB coordination
round_07_scaffold.rationale: Previous de novo designs created pockets too small for citrate. Scaffolding preserves citrate contacts while building protein around them.
round_07_scaffold.contig_explanation: Build scaffold segments between fixed motif residues. ~10-20 residues between each fixed residue to allow proper folding.

configs.name: r7b_scaffold_loose
configs.description: Looser scaffolding with longer linkers for more burial

configs.name: r7c_scaffold_unindexed
configs.description: Unindexed motif scaffolding - let RFD3 place motif optimally

motif_composition.chain_M: 5 motif residues (2 SER for H-bonds to citrate arms, 1 THR for hydroxyl H-bond, 2 GLU for TB coordination)

expected_coordination.citrate_Hbonds: SER/THR OG atoms to citrate carboxylates

key_parameters.cfg_scale: 2.0 required for H-bond conditioning to work effectively
key_parameters.select_buried: Ensures citrate is buried in protein core
